entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump I can't decide if it's cute or moronic that your delusional brain allows you to believe that they care.

*Jk, It's moronic.

100,000 confirmed U.S. COVID-19 deaths-most of which are due to your ineptitude, self-dealing, & non-response.

#PresDepravedIndifference
